tweets.text:
The UK has made a breakthrough in using science to tackle #coronavirus.

Don't feed a fatberg.

Putting used cooking fat and oil down your sink can block pipes, creating fatbergs.

Wait for used fat and oil to cool before scraping it into the bin.

Share this video and help protect the environment.

#Unblocktober https://t.co/O24wtjE4oR

urls.title: Ecologists warn moving ancient woodland for HS2 is a flawed
urls.description: HS2 bosses chopping down ancient woodland to make way for the train line accept there is a lack of research to support translocation - a scheme that moves soil to preserve wildlife after felling trees.
